Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
28.07.2004 SH SCR6095 Chaged some comments in program
19.08.2003 SH SCR4128 Changed extracting of zipcode DHSH_TYPE=5
11.06.2003 SH SCR3729 Write additional searchword to temp table if the search-
- word included special german charaters
19.03.2003 SH SCR3172 Added ' as separator character
13.02.2003 SH SCR2994 Replaced german special characters from searchwords
- which will be stored to TEMP_DCLN_SEARCHWORDS
12.12.2002 SH SCR2678 Implement new behavior for extraction with global string
- This string contains the possible separators.
24.04.2002 SCR1167 SH Store fields in table TDWC in UPPER_CASE
-- This program is a copy from BDH005. The differences are, that we are
-- extracting the searchwords from table DCLN and store them in the
-- temporary table TDWC
-- Set extract charcters
Previous separator
NAME 1
NAME 2
check for zip-code
run this block from zip-code position which is handled
-- Second word with replaced german special charaters
-- Second word with replaced german special charaters
